description.title: Events: contract calls another contract, both emit an event
description.purpose:
In the test a call into contract B, calls into contract A to emit an event, and then emits its own event. Under these circumstances both events should be in the tx receipt. It should also be possible to first call into contract A directly to emit and event, and for this to not effect any later calls.
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/4149
